title: Maurice Wilkins CBE FRS
Born: Maurice Hugh Frederick Wilkins , (1916-12-15)15 December 1916 , Pongaroa, New Zealand
Alma mater: University of Cambridge (MA) , University of Birmingham (PhD)
Spouse(s): Ruth Wilkins (div.) , Patricia Ann Chidgey ( m. 1959)
Awards: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine (1962)
Institutions: King's College London , University of Birmingham , University of California, Berkeley , University of St Andrews
Thesis: Phosphorescence decay laws and electronic processes in solids  (1940)
